description: This source file is a command-line interface (CLI) script for a project initializer tool. It parses command-line arguments for project configuration, constructs configuration objects, and initiates project setup based on templates, providing JSON-formatted output outlining success or failure.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Holds configuration details for initializing a project template, including commands, environment settings, and scripts.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Represents the configuration parameters of a project such as name, version, description, author, type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Defines different supported project types and provides a method to convert string inputs to enum values.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for creating project templates, initializing projects, and managing the overall setup process.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriately typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on a base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Serializes a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths suitable for JSON output.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a formatted JSON object indicating operation success or failure, with optional detailed info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: The main execution function that parses arguments, creates configurations, initiates project setup, and outputs the result.
